Chogath.name: БCho'GathБ
Chogath.title: Ббthe Terror of the VoidбБ
Chogath.lore:
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфThere is a place between dimensions, between worlds. To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown. To those that truly know, however, it is called the Void. Despite its name, the Void is not an empty place, but rather the home of unspeakable things - horrors not meant for minds of men. Cho'Gath is a creature born of the Void, a thing whose true nature is so awful most will not speak its name. Its fellows have been poking at the walls that divide dimensions for a crack, a way into Runeterra, where they can visit their own personal paradise of horror upon the world. They are called the Voidborn, creatures so ancient and terrible that they have been removed from history altogether. It is rumored that the Voidborn command vast armies of unspeakable creatures on other worlds, that they were once driven from Runeterra by powerful magic lost to antiquity.ЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфIf such tales are true, then the rumors that follow must be equally true - that one day, the Voidborn will return. Even now, something dark stirs in Icathia, perverting the summoning rituals of the League to allow the presence of Cho'Gath. It is an alien creature of malice and violence, a thing that causes all but the most stalwart to cringe in fear. Cho'Gath even appears to feed on its predations, growing and swelling as it gorges itself. Worse yet, the creature is intelligent, perhaps greatly so, making most wonder how such a monster could be contained. Fortunately, the power of the League's summoning has confined Cho'Gath's presence exclusively to the League of Legends. It is here that summoners use Cho'Gath's Voidborn abilities to help decide the fate of Runeterra. The Terror of the Void knows what fate it would choose for Runeterra, given half the chance.фФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБяЯюЮъЪщЩшШчЧцЦфФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

БбГгДдWoe betide the day when Cho'Gath grows weary of the League.дДгГбБ
Chogath.blurb: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфЦцЧчШшЩщЪъЮюЯяБбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФфThere is a place between dimensions, between worlds.  To some it is known as the Outside, to others it is the Unknown.  To those that truly know, however, it is ...
allytips: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФUse of Rupture and Feral Scream can lead to mana starvation, but if partnered with a champion such as Soraka or one with a Mana Manipulator, using both skills early can yield positive results.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗIf you're having difficulty feasting upon champions, try eating minions until you're larger.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗUsing Rupture on creeps in combination with Carnivore is a good way to gain health and mana.ЗжЖдДгГбБ
enemytips: БбГгДдЖжPurchasing a few HP items decreases the chances of Cho'Gath killing you quickly.жЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзFocus on preventing Cho'Gath from reaching his max size, or obtaining it again after you've killed him.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйRupture has a smoke cloud indicating the area it will strike. Try to watch out for it to prevent Cho'Gath from being able to combo his abilities.ЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ

spells.name: RuptureБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзRuptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиRuptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгД magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.ДгГбБ

spells.name: БFeral ScreamБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиCho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.иИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БбГSilences enemies in a cone for ГбБ{{ e2 }}Бб second(s) and deals бБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})Бб magic damage.Б

spells.name: БбVorpal SpikesБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзCho'Gath's attacks passively release deadly spikes, dealing damage to all enemy units in front of him.зЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip: БToggle: ББбГгBasic attacks launch spikes that deal гГбБ{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГгД magic damage. Spikes grow wider as Cho'gath levels.ДгГбБ

spells.name: FeastБ
spells.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИиЙйЛлПпФDevours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum health (maximum 6 stacks). Cho'Gath loses half of his stacks upon death.ФпПлЛйЙиИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
spells.tooltip:
БбГгHungrily devours an enemy dealing ГбБ{{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }})БбГг true damage to Champions, or 1000 ГбБ(+{{ a1 }})Бб true damage to minions.ГбБ

БбГгДдIf the enemy is killed by Feast, Cho'Gath grows, gaining ДгГбБ{{ e3 }}БбГгДдЖ maximum Health (maximum 6 stacks). Loses half of his stacks on death.ЖдДгГбБ

passive.name: БCarnivoreБ
passive.description: БбГгДдЖжЗзИWhenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers health and mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.ИзЗжЖдДгГбБ
